waligama hitapu nagarika manthriwariya pahara gani waligama, kapparathota pradeshaye hotalayakadi ehi himikariniya ada (15da) aluyama kisiyam pirisak wisin aayudha penwa biyaganwa ayage jip rathayada samaga paharagena gos athayi waligama mulasthana polisiya pawasayi.

rate aarthikaya gana kawuru monawa kiwwath dala jathika nishpadanayen athkaragath lokuma wathkama 2013 wasare di himikaragena athi bawath eya amerikanu dolar triliyana 67 k wana athara danata karana sanwardhanaya idiriyata gena yamin 2016 wasara wana wita eya triliyana siyayak dakwa wardhanaya karaganima rajaye aramuna bawa jathyanthara mulya sahayogithawa pilibanda jyeshta amathi ha niyojya mudal amathi aacharya sarath amunugama mahatha pawasiya.nidahasin pasu dala deshiya nishpadanayewathkama ihalama agayak labuwe 2013 wasare bawath eya 2007 wasare di amerikanu dolar triliyana 32.4 k wu athara ethan sita kramikawa wathkame agaya ihala giya bawa eeye (23) parlimenthuwe di prakasha kala amathiwaraya rajaya anugamanaya karana aarthika piliwetha me jayagrahanayata hethuwa bawa penwa dunneya.rajya naya sambandhayen wipakshaya waradi matha prakasha kalath dala deshiya nishpadanaye wardhanaya iwahal wimen naya anupathaya adukaraganimata hakiwi athi bawath eya 2016 wasara wana wita siyayata 70 dakwa adukaraganimata salasum kara athi bawath hethema kiweya.
samaharunta amathikamuth ahimi wela.

shri lankan guwan samagama kolambaa sita chinaye chonkin wetha guwan gaman aarambha kirimata katayuthu yoda thibe.juli masa 1 wanida sita shri lankan guwan yana chonkin wetha meheyum sidu karana athara eya nawatha paminimedi bankok haraha kolambaata langawimata niyamithaya.ee sandaha wana giwisuma pasugiya (08) da chonkin huwapont jathyanthara sancharaka sewa samagama ha shri lankan guwan samagama athara assan kirima sidu kerini.me wana wita shri lankan guwan samagama chinaye bijin, shanhayi, kantan saha honkon yana gamanantha sandaha sathiyakadi guwan gaman 15k sidu karana athara mema nawa guwan sewawa aarambha kirimath samanga niritha diga chinayata shri lankan guwan yana piyasara kirimada sidu wanu atha..
